Addon_14_CooldownReductionOnBasicAttackS.Description: The amount of seconds removed from the cooldown (if active) when the killer succeeds a basic attack on the survivor.

Addon_15_SurvivorDistanceFromTreasureChe.Description: The minimum distance a survivor needs to be from a chest for the Addon15 effect to be applied on the survivor.

Addon_15_EffectLifetime.Description: The lifetime (in seconds) the effect of Addon 15 will be applied on the survivor.

Addon_16_MangledEffectLifetime.Description: The lifetime of the status effect imposed on a survivor when injured by a basic attack

Addon_16_HemorrhageEffectLifetime.Description: The lifetime of the status effect imposed on a survivor when injured by a basic attack

Addon_17_UndetectableEffectLifetime.Description: The lifetime (in seconds) the undetectable effect of Addon 17 will be applied on the killer once all spells are on cooldown.

Addon_18_ObliviousEffectLifetime.Description: The lifetime of the status effect imposed on a survivor after a dice roll

Addon_18_MinimumGuaranteedMimicSpawnAmou.Description: Amount of chests that are guaranteed to be mimics at the beginning of match

ScoreEvent_TimeToReceiveBloodpointsAfter.Description: The amount of time the killer has to hit a survivor after triggering a spell to receive additional bloodpoints
